column1: INSTRUCTIONS - HOW TO USE THIS TEMPLATE
Welcome to the Ultimate Business Finance Dashboard!
This template is designed to help small business owners
entrepreneurs track their finances without needing accounting software.
â†’ Review and customize income/expense categories

â†’ Go to CLIENT DATABASE tab
â†’ This auto-fills when creating invoices

âœ“ UPDATE DAILY: Enter income and expenses as they happen

Q: How do I add a new income category?
A: Go to SETTINGS tab â†’ Find Income Categories â†’ Add to the list
The dropdown in Income Tracker will update automatically
Q: How do I create an invoice?
A: Go to INVOICE GENERATOR tab â†’ Select client from dropdown â†’ Add line items
â†’ Review totals â†’ Print or save as PDF
Consult a tax professional for your specific situation
Q: How do I change the currency?
A: Go to SETTINGS tab â†’ Find Financial Settings â†’ Change Currency Symbol
Q: Can I use this for multiple businesses?
A: Make a copy of this template for each business
Q: How do I see my profit for a specific month?
A: Go to DASHBOARD â†’ Monthly Trend section shows profit by month
